Synopsis: Creates a new HTML accordion element with customizable options.
Description: This function creates a new HTML accordion element with the specified accordion item content, duration of animation, and option to collapse on click.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
New-HTMLAccordion -AccordionItem { "Accordion Content Here" } -Duration 500 -CollapseOnClick
Creates a new HTML accordion with the specified content, animation duration of 500 milliseconds, and collapses on click.
